ProductInfo.Features:

<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <6> Vivitar 67mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
